clients.title: The Average Google My Business (GMB) Profile Has 73 Reviews, 45 Photos, 5 Posts & a 4.08 Rating
description: According to analysis by Places Scout, the average GMB profile has 73 reviews, 45 photos, 5 Posts and a star rating of 4.08. Of course it is important to have a 4 or a 5 star rating, but it is also important to respond timely to reviews- they found only 19% of business owners responded to reviews. Photos translate into more visibility and consumer engagement, so add photos on a regular basis where possible. Other ways to improve your presence on GMB are to add a business description to your listing and utilize Google Posts.
